item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition
item.description:
Title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Fatshark
Publisher: Fatshark
Franchise: Warhammer , Fatshark
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Content

You are justice.

The Adeptus Arbites enforce the Lex Imperialis – the Imperial Law. Utterly unforgiving, they persecute heretics and traitors throughout the Emperor’s realm. As an Arbitrator, you are a warrior of the Emperor’s justice, prosecuting crimes against the Imperium with disciplined zeal. Restore order to Tertium with your Cyber-Mastiff and a devastating array of new weaponry.

Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class Deluxe Edition includes*:

  • Arbites Class

  • Unique Class Outfit

  • Unique Companion Outfit

  • Portrait Frame

  • 4 Weapon Skins

*Aside from the portrait frame, these cosmetics are exclusive to the Arbites Class and cannot be equipped on other classes.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Includes bloody violence and gore.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i5-6600 (3.30GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 2400G (3.6 GHz)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 570
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7-9700K (3.70GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (4.2GHz)
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / RTX 2060 OR AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 72 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: An SSD storage device is highly recommended

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class
item.description:
Title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Arbites Class
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Fatshark
Publisher: Fatshark
Franchise: Warhammer , Fatshark
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Content

You are justice.

The Adeptus Arbites enforce the Lex Imperialis – the Imperial Law. Utterly unforgiving, they persecute heretics and traitors throughout the Emperor’s realm. As an Arbitrator, you are a warrior of the Emperor’s justice, prosecuting crimes against the Imperium with disciplined zeal. Restore order to Tertium with your Cyber-Mastiff and a devastating array of new weaponry.

Command your Cyber-Mastiff

A relentless, cybernetically-engineered hound, your R-VR is never far from your side. Direct your vicious kill-dog to take down enemies, disable priority targets and provide critical support to your strike team. This is no pet - it’s a fearsome weapon.

Your judgment. How will you enforce it?

Craft your unique Arbitrator by mixing freely between 80+ talent nodes or choose one of the three distinct combat styles found in Darktide’s branching talent trees.

The Arbitrator’s commanding presence hits the battlefield with a shock. Barking orders and laying down withering suppressing fire, they control crowds before moving in for the killing blow. They bring new technology in the form of the Nuncio Aquila, anti-grav vox platforms that amplify their commands, overwhelming their weak-willed opponents.

Exact punishment with extreme prejudice

Clad in their iconic carapace armour and wielding potent weapons of oppression, the Arbitrators strike with prodigious force. Muscle forwards with reinforced Assault Shields and a choice of Dominator Maul or Arbites Shotpistol - Darktide’s first defense/range combo. For tougher targets, the Arbites Shotgun packs a unique punch with its Special Issue ammunition.

Sanction wears many faces

Though they consider the Lex Imperialis to be a singular truth, no two enforcers are alike. Customise your Arbitrator, choose from six voices across three personalities, cosmetics for your Cyber-Mastiff, character, and weapons.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Includes bloody violence and gore.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i5-6600 (3.30GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 2400G (3.6 GHz)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 570
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel i7-9700K (3.70GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (4.2GHz)
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / RTX 2060 OR AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 50 MB available space

item.title: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
item.description:
Title: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
Genre: Casual , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , Simulation
Developer: Lunheim Studios
Publisher: Future Friends Games
Franchise: Future Friends Games
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Game

What is Tiny Aquarium ?

  • Create your dream aquarium and fill it with beautiful fishy friends

  • Switch to Tiny Mode for a calming desktop companion

  • Play the fishing minigame to discover rare and exotic new breeds

  • Connect with friends to visit their tanks, trade fish and join live events

Jump into a relaxing haven where you nurture vibrant fish, design your dream underwater world, and connect with friends.

Tiny Aquarium is a real-time idle game, meaning the fish keep growing while you’re away – even when you’re offline! Be sure to check in regularly and see how your fishy friends are doing.

Begin a relaxing journey toward building your dream aquarium. Hatch new fish, customize your aquarium, and interact with your friends.

Create the aquarium of your dreams, and place it on your desktop as a companion using Tiny Mode. The fish can keep you company throughout the day, whether you’re working, studying, or just kicking back with some videos!

Discover and learn about dozens of real and fantasy fish, with new ones being added regularly so there is always something to look forward to.



Explore Tiny Aquarium's exciting online functionalities. Visit strangers, trade fish, and join in on fun new events.

Or go for a relaxing sea trip with the new fishing minigame ! Grab a rod and kick back – alone, with friends, or even with strangers, chatting and browsing other aquariums as you go. Upgrade your rod and ship and be on the lookout for the most dazzling catch.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64bit
    • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
    • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel x64
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

Linux

    Minimum:
    • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (64-bit) or SteamOS 3.0+
    • Processor: x86_64 with SSE2 instruction-set support
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ compatible GPU
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Ship, Inc.
item.description:
Title: Ship, Inc.
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Rogue Duck Interactive
Publisher: Rogue Duck Interactive
Franchise: RDI Strategy Games
Release Date: Jun 23, 2025




About This Game

Ever wanted to step into the shoes of a packaging expert? In Ship, Inc. , you take on the role of a packaging employee at a fast-paced cargo shipment company. Your job? Sort, package, and ship parcels to their correct destinations while keeping up with the growing demands of the business.

How It Works

At Ship, Inc., every package counts! Follow shipment orders carefully, choose the right box sizes, and ensure each package reaches its destination safely. Misplacing or damaging shipments could cost you, so be precise and efficient!

Key Features

📦 Cozy & Wholesome Packaging System – Select the correct box size, arrange items properly, and seal them securely before shipping.

📋 Order Processing – Keep an eye on incoming orders and ship parcels correctly to maximize efficiency.

🧰 Upgrade Your Office – Earn money to improve your workspace, increase storage, and unlock better shipping tools.

⏱️ Time Management Challenges – Stay on top of customer demands as you balance speed and accuracy in your shipments.

💥 Deliver With Care – Packages must be handled properly! Fragile items require extra attention to avoid damage during transit.

🚀 Dynamic Difficulty – As you progress, new challenges and complex orders will test your multitasking skills.

Run a Successful Wholesome Shipping Business

Every second counts in the shipping industry! Improve your workflow, make the right decisions, and prove yourself as the best packaging expert in Ship, Inc. . Are you up for the challenge?

Different Game Modes

Ship, Inc. includes 3 different modes (difficulty based modes) that invites all players.

  • 🧘 Chill Mode: No timer; less penalties; just chill and pack stuff.

  • 📦 Normal Mode: Standard timer and penalties; intended progression. Good luck on your new job!

  • 🔥 Rush Hour Mode: You have less time to pack and more penalties for your mistakes. I hope they pay you well.

Please go top of the page and use Add to Wishlist button to be notified for the release on 23rd June 10 am UTC 💛

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

Linux

item.title: Outrider Mako
item.description:
Title: Outrider Mako
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Asamado Games
Publisher: PLAYISM
Franchise: PLAYISM
Release Date: Jun 22, 2025




About This Game

In Outrider Mako, explore the Mayoi World—a fantastical world where gods reside—find items requested by said gods, and deliver them in nicely wrapped packages in 2D top-down action gameplay.

Collect Seal Stamps to Return Home

Mako falls into the Mayoi World and finds herself at the Bumon Delivery Center, which a strange monster named Mozu claims is a package delivery service. Mako ends up becoming an outrider for the delivery center. She will need to collect seal stamps from the gods of the Mayoi World in the apprentice notes given to her by Mozu to fill it with spirit energy and return to her own world.

Explore the World of the Gods and Deliver Their Packages

Mako is tasked with the job of collecting items requested by gods and delivering them in special packages. She will have to explore a mononoke-infested world to get items such as crystals, wrap them up nicely at a workbench, and then deliver them to her holy clients. But some items can only be obtained by defeating powerful enemies...

Wield the Power of Red Nectar to Defeat Mononoke

All sorts of dangerous mononoke will interrupt Mako's work. Learn their attacks and jump to avoid them, then leap around to go on the offensive. Other than her trusty magic rod, Mako has all sorts of things that will help her in battles, such as red nectar, which can slow down enemies, as well as secondary weapons, elixirs, stakes, and more. Use them well to clear Mako's path and ensure a smooth delivery.

Use Divine Blessing Talismans to Your Advantage

Mako can obtain Divine Blessing Talismans on the job. Equip them to gain all sorts of boons, such as enhancing the effects of red nectar or raising item drop rates.

Challenge Powerful, Enraged Gods

Some of the packages are addressed to gods who have gone on a rampage for one reason or another. However, while the gods may be powerful, they're not invincible. Identify their weaknesses and fight them with all your might to quell their anger and, of course, give them their packages.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Win 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-6500U cPU @ 2.50 GHz or higher
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 520 or higher
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
